title: Is this why Brexit has dragged on too long? Three quarters of MPs have never struck a business deal, poll finds
text:
MPs and peers are ignorant about business deal-making, according to the first-ever survey of the professional backgrounds of politicians.

The research suggests the three and a half years it has taken to conclude Brexit talks is linked to the amateurishness of its lead negotiators.

The survey found that of the 650 members of Parliament and nearly 1,000 Lords, most hailed from the public sector and only a minority had any private sector experience and expertise.
